message.content:
cs.SE, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.CY, cs.SY 

The paper discusses the need for adaptive compliance in mission-critical software, particularly in the context of cloud computing. This involves extending the traditional compliance management lifecycle with the activities of the Monitor-Analyse-Plan-Execute (MAPE) loop, which is a common approach in the field of software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also discusses compliance concerns and the need for compliance management in highly distributed and changing environments, which are relevant to the fields of cybersecurity (cs.CR), distributed computing (cs.DC), and cyber-physical systems (cs.CY, cs.SY).
